Original Text:
\Eお、来たね。
親父さんから話は聞いているよ。
Machine translation:
\EOh, you're here.
I've heard the story from your old man.
Better translation:
\E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]Oh, you're here.
I've heard the story from your old man.

Original Text:
\E収穫、水汲み、柵の補修…やることは山ほどある。
仕事はきついが手伝ってくれればバイト代を出そう。
Machine translation:
\EThere's so much to do, like harvesting, fetching water, and repairing fences.
The work is tough, but if you help out, I'll pay you for your part-time job.
Better translation:
\E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]There's so much to do, like harvesting, fetching water, and repairing fences.
The work is tough, but if you help out, I'll pay you for the you've done.

Original Text: \Eお金も貰えて体力もつくなんて最高だな。
Machine translation: \EIt's amazing that you can get money and increase your stamina.
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]It's a great way to obtain money while also improving stamina.

Original Text:
\Eおーい、そこのあんちゃん。
よく働くねぇ…ほら、これ持っていきな。
Machine translation:
\EHey, you there, kid.
You work hard, huh... Here, take this.
Better translation:
\E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]Hey, you there, kid.
You've been working hard, huh... Here, take this.
